entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , White Rock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:01 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: White Rock 11:00 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: 8.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 6.9°C
Wind: S 19 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. High 9.

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023
